title: Cane River National Heritage Area: Carpooling / Vanpooling
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Carpooling / Vanpooling              Carpooling / Vanpooling        Carpooling or vanpooling is not available within the Cane River National Heritage Area. Photo by John Lees   Â     Artwork of self-taught artist Clementine Hunter at Melrose Plantation, a National Historic Landmark. This legendary plantation was established by a family of "gens de couleur libre" (free people of color)around the time of the Louisiana Purchase. Later, Melrose became a 20th century artist colony. Clementine Hunter's murals at Melrose Plantation, Photo by John Lees
